docs.snippet: WESTPORT, Conn., Aug. 8 -- South American citizens are tired of getting second-rate movies from the United States and should be sent "first-string movies, diplomats, artists, and professors and the like," Laurence Feldman, co-producer of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WESTPORT, Conn., Aug. 8 -- South American citizens are tired of getting second-rate movies from the United States and should be sent "first-string movies, diplomats, artists, and professors and the like," Laurence Feldman, co-producer of the independent New York Repertory Theater now touring South America with five plays, said today, Mr. Feldman is co-owner of the Westport Country Playhouse.
docs.abstract: co-producer L Feldman repts tour success; defends choice of plays against recent criticism by Sen Bush, others

headline.main: Co-Producer of Latin Play Tour Rebuts Senator Bush's Criticism

docs.snippet: The basic tenets for President Kennedy's Latin-American "Alliance for Progress" plan, as well as the supporting ideas of the major countries and organizations and the opposing ideas of Cuba, have now been set out at Punta del Este, Uruguay. This...
docs.lead_paragraph: The basic tenets for President Kennedy's Latin-American "Alliance for Progress" plan, as well as the supporting ideas of the major countries and organizations and the opposing ideas of Cuba, have now been set out at Punta del Este, Uruguay. This important conference of the economic ministers of all twenty-one nations of the Organization of American States now has the bases for discussion that will go on over the next few weeks.
